item.title: Robust Multi-bit Text Watermark with LLM-based Paraphrasers
item.description: Researchers developed a robust multi-bit text watermarking method using LLMs for paraphrasing, achieving over 99.99% detection accuracy while maintaining semantic information and resisting common atta…

item.title: How Far is Video Generation from World Model: A Physical Law Perspective
item.description: Scaling video generation models doesn’t guarantee they’ll learn physics; this study reveals they prioritize visual cues over true physical understanding.
